gameDetails.name: Escape: The Curse of the Temple – Queenie 2: Doomed
gameDetails.description:
A set of three promotional tiles given to Kickstarter backers of the game.

The first two new tiles are curses: Doomed and Stand up.  If a player is cursed with Doomed, they cannot escape from the temple until lifting the curse.  If a player is cursed with Stand up, they must remain standing until lifting the curse.

The third new tile is a treasure: Counterspell.  Counterspell can be used to discard one curse card.
